description: At the beginning the mechanics are not so intuitive, but run your simulated world in the background and give it a quick look within the day to get a break (and adjust the routes!).

The game is complex and fun. The manual for the game needs improvement. Fortunately, there is a channel on YouTube that explains how to install and play the game. The early clips are shaky in the recording quality, the content is one of the best available in English. You reach the clip at address (https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLY7wQUAn7NB2Iwr4IrO8LYAXEFzqpOo6P).
For those of you who have trouble playing the game there is a playlist (https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLY7wQUAn7NB2Iwr4IrO8LYAXEFzqpOo6P) with a manual.

summary: The best oldschool Transport Simulator ever

description: игра очень непонятная чо делать я хз даже туториала нету
summary: игра неплохая и не понятная я не знаю как в нее играть!
